Header: Fire in Teak Reserve Brought Under Control
Content: Sri Lanka Army troops of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) rose to the occasion and joined hands with Forest Department employees and Policemen to extinguish a fire that was spreading in the Teak Reserve at Horombuwa, Kumbukana at Moneragala during Thursday (6) evening. The fire suspected to have been set upon by interested parties was however brought under control by Army personnel with the support of others.
